name: TSM TalkShopMedia
overview: Talk Shop Media is a bright, agile and competitive team that is single-handedly changing the face of media relations and experiential PR. As one of the largest and most connected PR firms in the West - Talk Shop is led by three respected and highly connected PR powerhouses. Between them, Sara Pereira, Beth Boyle and Katie Reiach have succeeded in securing millions of dollars worth of coverage for US and Canadian clients like Expedia CruiseShipCenters, Bosa Properties, Tagga Media, Rio Tinto Alcan and TEDX. From front-page features to interviews with Oprah and CNN- creating and delivering priceless media opportunities has allowed Talk Shop Media to truly walk its talk.
